about_the_game:
Take your adventure and exploration games to the next level with this graphic set for RPG Maker MV and MZ.
Inspired by medieval castles, it allows you to create exciting dark fantasy castle interiors!

◇Features◇
- Two characters, a main character and an enemy boss character, with walking animation for the main character.
- Objects such as furniture and miscellaneous items.
- Doors that can be opened and closed.
- Three different kinds of walls and floors to create different impressions of castle room interiors.
- Character icons
And so forth! This collection is packed with a variety of assets to help you indulge in dark fantasy aesthetics!

◇Contents◇
- Characters: 2 types
- UI (icons, etc.): 2 types
- Door object: 1 piece
- Tiles: 4 (768 x 768px)
All tiles are created with 48 x 48 square pixels.
Some object designs are also included in the tiles.

----

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
